ctx: intros l1 l2 l3 H1 H2 H3.
inversion H1; inversion H2; inversion H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1, l2, l3 : list (Term A n) H1 : minusP l1 l2 l3 H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM l1 H3 : canonical A0 eqA ltM l2 l0 : list (Term A n) H : pO A n = l1 H0 : l0 = l2 H4 : mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l2 = l3 H5 : olist (A:=A) ltM l1 H6 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) l1 H7 : olist (A:=A) ltM l2 H8 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) l2 Unable to unify "Relation_Operators_compat.Desc ?M2124 ?M2125 ((?M2128 ++ ?M2127 :: nil) ++ ?M2126 :: nil)" with "Relation_Operators_compat.Desc (mon n) ltM (fP A n (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l2))".

original: intros l1 l2 l3 H1 H2 H3. inversion H1; inversion H2; inversion H3. constructor. constructor. Apply canonical_plusP; auto.
